com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.ext

Class SimplePolicyHandlerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.policy.wspolicy.handler.ext.SimplePolicyHandlerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WSPHandlerFactory

    public abstract class SimplePolicyHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements WSPHandlerFactory
    This is a helper class for constructing a WPSHandlerFactory that will create a choice-agnostic policy handler. It is useful when the processing logic of a policy handler is not affected by which policy alterative(s) has been selected.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public MessageHandler create(PolicyChoices policyChoices,
                             HandlerContext context,
                             HandlerRole role)
                      throws GException
        Description copied from interface: WSPHandlerFactory
        Create a MessageHandler from a normalized set of policy choices.
        Specified by:
        create in interface WSPHandlerFactory
        Parameters:
        policyChoices - The object containing information about normalized policy choices defined in a policy file.
        context - The handler context.
        Returns:
        A MessageHandler derived from the policy choices. The message handler should be able to match and process a given SOAP message based on the policy choices. It ususally should be a subclass of ChoiceAwarePolicyHandler. Return null if there is no processing required based on all the policy choices.
        Throws:
        GException

      • create

        protected abstract MessageHandler create(Policy policy,
                                         HandlerContext context,
                                         HandlerRole role)
                                  throws GException
        Create the MessageHandler based on a normazlied policy choice. Subclasses should provide implementation to create the policy handler in a domain specific way.
        Parameters:
        policy - This is normalzied policy choice. This object contains a All operator which in turns contains a set of domain-specific policy assertions.
        context -
        role -
        Returns:
        A policy handler derived from the policy choice.
        Throws:
        GException
